page.title: 16 The Parish Council.
page.content: There are 11 members of the Parish Council including the chairman.Present members are:T.Hinton(chairman),J.W. Anscomb,A.A.Bedford,A.Collett,S.Taylor, J.Masters,M.C.Wadland,Mrs.I.E.Coulson, Mrs.E.B.Peskett and Mrs.B.Masters.Clerk to the Council is Mrs.C.Kennett. The Council is responsible for the repair of street lighting and erecting new ones.They investigate applications by householders who are seeking planning permission for home extensions. Currently they are trying to find an alternative site for a cemetery as the churchyard is nearly full.Reports on vandallism come up before the council and complaints regarding obstruction to pathways by overhanging hedges etc.Should further action be necessary it is left to the Parish clerk to send out letters and deal with the ensuing correspondence.
